case.state: Aloy here. Erend told me I should take some time off, so... here I am.
Good to see you, Sucrose. You taught me a lot about mixing herbs together. Maybe this time, I'll have something to teach you.
Hu Tao, right? Sorry to disappoint, but I'm not dead yet. Haven't met a machine that can keep me down.
Hey, Barbara. I enjoyed your shows while I was in Teyvat. Guess you'll be putting on another one for us today.
Still working hard, Ganyu? Me too. Maybe we're both here to try to relax a little, whether we want to or not.
Oh... Fischl. That bird friend of yours still creeps me a little. I hope he couldn't hear me say that.
Still working to become a knight, Noelle? Positions like that aren't as great as they seem... but good luck, all the same.
We getting started? Alright, let's not waste any more time.
This is what the character says when the game starts
I don't need any help. Not this time.
This should be fine. My luck's working out this time.
I've always been kind of lucky, so... I think I'll keep what I have.
No thanks. This should be fine.
...Better just start over.
Yeah, this isn't working. I'll throw these all out.
You don't get these in the field, so... for once, I'll take a do-over.
The first draw didn't work out. I'll hedge my bets on the second.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. I think that's a good strategy.
...~Cards.text~? That should be fine.
I'll put my confidence in ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. That usually works.
Give me ~cards.text~. I could use it.
I don't know a lot about games, but I'm pretty good at Machine Strike. Hope some of that knowledge transfers over.
A lot of people have doubted me. A lot of people have also been proven wrong.
Easier than hunting rabbits.
Why do so many worlds meet here, anyway...?
If you guys didn't want to see me naked this badly, you could've just said so.
Maybe I should've gotten a good view of the landscape before we started.
I'm not so reckless as to do it for fun, but... there is a certain thrill to hunting.
Cards make more sense to me than people. They're just numbers. At least they're objective.
You guys treat me with a lot less suspicion than I'm used to. It's... nice.
Is this the part where I'm supposed to cover my chest and act like I didn't know what I was getting into?
I know I have nothing to prove to him, but sometimes I just want to rub my victories in Sylens's face.
Only wish I had some war paint. It's silly, but it makes me feel like I can take on the world.
You can get knocked on your ass all you want, but the important part is not staying down.
I'm not giving up until the hunt is over.
It's hard to make sense of what I'm feeling right now. I'll just let instinct guide me.
Stare if you want. I'll pay you back for it.
Feels like I just found some fresh salvebrush in the wild. Always nice to stumble upon just what I need.
It doesn't matter how many layers of defense you have. If you're my prey, I'll just tear right through them.
Mmh... Gotta make sure to stretch every once in a while.
Ever gone gliding over an open plain? It's a lot more fun than I expected... not that I do it for fun.
The right tools for the right job. Always a good mantra.
Find the weak spot and strike. Too bad none of you have obvious weak points.
Nothing feels better than silencing the people who doubted you.
Some people are happy just to make it through the day. Me, I'm always trying to do better.
I'd say I can work with this, but... that'd imply there's anything I can do but wait for the result.

Chances of victory are...
And the focus says...
Lot of downtime in this game. Almost makes me want to pull out my supplies and start crafting.
Rost always said: "patience."
I'm not usually one for small talk, but... I think I can learn.
I'd ask the All-Mother to lend me a hand, but I know better than to put my faith in that stuff.
Guess I'll have to work for this. Nothing's ever easy, is it...
I'm about to start pacing. I don't know how you all can just stand around like this.
A victory can be hollow... But here, I think that's less of a concern.
Any of you know anything about machines? Might have to pick your brains later...
I've always wanted to meet a person from another time. This place is perfect for me.
It took me a while to realize this, but strong allies are a must if you're fighting a strong foe.
Honestly, I've never understood the taboo around nudity. I only respect it because Rost taught me to.
There's a statue of me in Meridian. I don't like being revered, but... At least I look good.

Why obsess over size, anyway...?
They all serve the same function...
I had a lot of defense... Wish my strategy was half as sound...
Any of you want to go for a run after this? It'd be nice to get some exercise after all this standing around.
I'm not much for faith, but... Hopefully these cards will show me something good.
Never liked attention... but it's not so bad when it's for the right reasons.
Beta could use some socializing... But at a place like this...?
I've gotten a lot better at climbing recently. Practice makes perfect.
Nobody's going to start raving about "Land-Gods" all of a sudden, right?
I'm starting to get the hang of this. Never tried exposing myself for fun before...
As far as I'm concerned, you're all my prey here -- and I never lose a hunt.
Even an AI couldn't win every time at this game, huh? Too much luck involved.
...Sorry. Thought I heard something.
I'm used to making my own equipment, so being stuck with something someone else gave me...
Hunt's off to a bad start. Not too late to pull it back, though...
I've got this instinct telling me to win at all costs... Need to remind it that this game isn't so serious.
Let's just try to keep this quick.
I don't want to be a sore loser, but... nobody likes losing, do they?
I'm not so desperate as to want to lose. I'll at least try my hardest first.
I'm lucky I had Rost teaching me when I was growing up. He taught me everything I know about foraging, hunting, socializing... I miss him.
The hunter usually doesn't become the hunted this fast...
Machines, AI, gods, dragons... Trouble just follows me everywhere.
And this is why a hunter doesn't divide her attention.
I think I have a reputation for being more blunt than I actually am. I just often deal with insufferable people.
I heard that when Rost named me, he held me over a cliff and yelled it to the skies. A little over-dramatic, if you ask me.
Huh, this is... Oh. This is pretty terrible, isn't it? Just my luck.

{small}Let's see... No pairs, no matches, no... Hmm...{!reset}
Oh, sorry. Talking to myself is a force of habit.
I thought this was a winning strategy... Well, it's not all bad.
Turns out "out with the old, in with the new" doesn't always result in something better.
Like getting discovered by a Thunderjaw... which is to say, this sucks.
Nothing makes me want to strip more than the heat in the middle of the year... But that's usually a recipe for burning my skin.
The Tenakth say I have hair like blood. I'm pretty sure it's supposed to be a compliment.
The outcome doesn't matter to me either way... Though winning feels like more of a punishment now.
I'm not sure how much longer I'm going to last, so... It helps to stretch first.
Should've known better than to underestimate my prey. So, ready to "eat" me?
This is... probably a bad time to talk about "mounting," right?
Oh, and this thing on my ear is called a Focus. It can interface with technology. It lets me see things about machines other people can't. I won't take it off. It's too important to me.
If you grew up in the wilds, staying indoors for too long feels stifling. I'll play the game, but I'm not sticking around afterwards.
No Nora cares about dead people as much as I do. What about all of you? Anything interesting in your history?
I've actually been to another world once before. It was a mystical land called Teyvat. Interesting place. Maybe some of the people there have found their way here.
I doubt I'll be changing up my look anytime soon, but... Well, a culture exchange doesn't sound too bad. I can teach you what Rost taught me, too.
That's the gist of it, yeah. Us humans struggle to survive while the Cauldrons spit out more machines than we can count.
That's the long and short of it. I'm doing what I can to correct that balance, but it's hard enough for us humans to survive in the wild.
It's not just machines. People can turn their backs on you at the drop of a hat. You've always got to be wary.
I'm not just cautious of machines. Humans have honestly caused me more trouble -- and they don't have the excuse of AI guiding them.
...At least you get to the point. Yeah, I hunt machines. It's kind of a way of life where I'm from.
...Points for honesty, at least. Yeah, I fight robots. High-tech machines with full arsenals of weaponry, but robots nonetheless.
Well, to summarize, self-replicating machines nearly wiped out life on Earth. A number of AI were supposed to restore it, but they were sabotaged and their own machines went rogue.
To get you up to speed, self-replicating machines pretty much ate everything on the old world. Some AI nearly restored it, but they were sabotaged and the machines they made went berserk.
I'm a traveler, but yeah. I come from a world other than Teyvat, but I did visit for a time.
Well, there's a lot. It really depends on what tribe you come from...
Good to see you too, Sucrose. I should come back sometime. Starting to miss all the people in Mondstadt.
No, it disappeared when I returned. My world doesn't have magic like that, so I didn't expect it to come with me.
Honestly? Mondstadt. I admire how you guys can live free. It's even a part of your faith. The tribes could use a belief system like that.
...You think? I'm glad to hear it. I stretch and do some exercise to start off the day, but I think most of it comes from my regular activities.
Huh? Speak up a little.
It's Aloy. A-loy. Pretty standard name among the Nora, I think.
I don't do a lot of things for fun. Usually I'm hunting, climbing, talking, eating, or sleeping... Well, that game, Machine Strike, is pretty fun.
...Alright, I'm listening.
I haven't thought about it that much, but... people who can handle themselves, I think. The ones that aren't afraid to rush into combat with me.
The same way any hunter does. Planning, intuition... and the tools of the trade.
With a good plan, some intuition, and the right tools, any machine can be overcome.
It doesn't happen everywhere. Some tribes plant seeds. Others are just happy to leave their dead where they fell.
What, a bunch of scattered tribes one bad day away from killing each other isn't the height of civility?
Well, that sentiment goes both ways. Difference is, I'd like to see some "fleshy" beasts. You probably don't want to meet any machines.
Nice to meet you too. It's rare to see other outcasts. I have to know, though... I've been an outcast since birth. How about you?
A little bit of this, a little bit of that. Anything the craftsmen in my world can scavenge off of machines, they put to use.
It's a little bit of both, Nami. My society is primitive, but a highly advanced one lived long ago. We use what they left behind.
We're definitely not that advanced, but the society before ours was. We're just putting what they left us to good use.
I guess this is the part where I introduce myself, right? I'm Aloy, a Nora Seeker.
Right, maybe it's time for a proper introduction. I'm Aloy, of the Nora.
I didn't get a lot of time to introduce myself. Name's Aloy, of the Nora.
I'm up again? It's a good thing this armor has plenty of protection. I can last for a little while.
You must all be taking this pretty seriously. That's good. I like a little competition.
Damn, another one down. I'm not very good at games. Not a lot of time for them when you're saving the world.
A hunter getting torn apart like this... Well, if this were the wilds, I'd already be dead.
Taking this much of a beating on a hunt... Guess I'll count myself lucky you're not machines.
Hmm. Not a big deal. I don't mind the nudity. Just my terrible luck...
All eyes on me again. I'm used to it at this point. Growing up an outcast, then becoming a Seeker, then the Savior... Most people can't help but stare.
I've still got a couple layers of defense left. That said, I'm not too worried about winning or losing. I'm trying my best to relax.
Last one. I might look a little... excited. I don't help myself down there very often, so I get pretty pent up.
Our world still had our heroes, but I wish we had something like your "Overwatch." Maybe things wouldn't have turned out so badly.
Elisabet, Project Zero Dawn... They were heroes, but nothing like your "Overwatch." Just a bunch of scientists and researchers doing their best.
...I guess that's not impossible. I've already met a few people from space. Ted Faro, the Faro Plague, Zero Dawn -- that ring any bells?
...Well, I won't rule it out. You're not the first person from space I've met. Depends on whether the Faro Plague is what wiped out humanity for you, though.
...No, that's the other one. I'm Aloy. You know, the machine hunter? Thought you'd have heard of me.
Yeah, it really just depends on where you come from. We all send off the dead in different ways.
In my eyes, it was just another piece of equipment. I stuck to my bow, and I only tried to use it to augment my techniques.
Huh. Didn't think you would care. Well, yeah, I have. It was... alright, but it's not exactly a priority.
...Well, I can kind of see the logic in that, honestly. For the tribes, the sea isn't good for much more than fishing and getting attacked by the water-bound machines.
In my world, we call them Freeze Bombs. Made out of metal scraps and Chillwater -- a liquid coolant used by machines.
If only, Sucrose. Too many people let their faiths control them, even when they lead to nothing but carnage.
A curiosity, huh? You're starting to sound like Sylens. Guess that's just how scientists think of people.
I liked the flowers in Teyvat, but it's not something I've stopped to think about. Traditions like that don't mean much to me.
Trust me, I'd take Mondstadt any day over a tribe. They live free, but at least they have people keeping the peace.
That's my preference, but... Well, what's important to me is that it's with somebody I like.
That's... part of it, yeah. If you can show everybody you took down a great machine, it shows you're not somebody to be messed with.
You need to be armored up when you're in the wild. Otherwise, you might get your chest caved in by a Behemoth.
This all might seem like overkill, but you need to be ready for anything when you're hunting machines. Would've gotten my legs torn off a dozen times without these.
And if that doesn't mean anything to you, then the Nora are my tribe, and Seeker is my rank. Not that I put much stock in it.
I know how that sounds, but it's the truth. If any of you are from the old world, you might remember Elisabet Sobeck. Inventor of GAIA, and... my mother. Sort of.
Good boots are necessary when you're out in the wild. Otherwise you might slip while climbing, or get your legs bitten off by a Snapmaw.
This all might seem like overkill, but you need to be ready for anything when you're hunting machines. Would've gotten my arms torn off a dozen times without these.
I don't mind my body being seen. It's not like I show off, but... I figure I've got bigger things to worry about.
This place is... different, though. You all don't treat me much differently than anybody else. It's strange, but it's also... kind of nice.
I don't usually want to relax. I've got more important things to do. Every second spent laying down is one I could've spent on helping the world.
It's been a little while since last time, so... Yeah, I should stop talking. You don't need to know all of this.
And... I guess none of you know who I am. That's fine by me.
...Huh, that's weird. Most people have some sort of reaction when I tell them my name. Well, I don't mind.
I've hunted plenty of quarry. Machines, animals... even humans.
As a hunter, I've faced down all sorts of foes. Machines, animals... humans...
I know. And... thanks. It hasn't been easy, but I won't stop until I've brought back the world Elisabet wanted to protect.
You're right, I know that. And... thank you. Elisabet fought to save my world for a reason. I won't stop until I've made it right again.
Hmph. Weird way to size someone up, but you're right. I don't plan on keeling over any time soon.
I'm an outcast, so I don't put much stock in stuff like that. But... the Utaru plant seeds, so new life can sprout from death. I think that one is nice.
No, I had my sights set on bigger things. ...But, well, I'm not opposed to it, if the right person came along.
Well, as good as that sounds for you, I'd still have to say no. I'm fighting to bring the world back how it should be. I won't let anybody screw that up now.
Yeah? I'll bring you a Blaze canister next time, then. I'd like to see what you could do with a mechanical source of Pyro.
That so? You're a different breed from the people I know, Sucrose. ...Literally. If you're trying to bait my curiosity, you've succeeded.
Right, but it's not exactly something you can naturally synthesize. It's probably for the best that you don't rely on it.
It's in my genes. No matter who tries to stop me, I'm never going to stop fighting for what I need to do.
Don't worry, I know what you meant. You're just... fun to tease.
It's hard to consider myself a Nora, anyway. I was made an outcast at birth, and... I won't bore you with the details. We can just move on.
Since I'm the only one who can control her tech, it's my duty to finish what Elisabet started. Fix GAIA, save the world. If only it were that simple...
I know "hunting machines" might sound weird. Machines are everywhere on my world. They're more like animals than the ones you're probably used to, and most of them aren't friendly.
...That might've been too morbid. Still, that's just one of the things I have to worry about. Machines are ruthless, so I'm trying my best to pacify them.
Maybe you all can change my tune, though. The people I usually get attention from are rarely worth a second glance.
...That being said, I imagine you're all inclined to stare at me right now. Well, go ahead. Getting this kind of attention isn't so bad.
But this has been fun. I'm not very good with people, but I've enjoyed the time I got to spend here. So... thanks.
I've just never had a crowd before. Or, well, anybody watching me. It definitely feels weird, but... I'm not complaining.
If I'm a nobody here, it just means I have to prove myself. I'm used to that by now.
All this means is that I have to show you why my name is worth remembering. No problem.
Don't worry, I'm not coming for any of you. But you're all still my prey, and I'm not giving up until I've won.
I'm still on the hunt here, don't get me wrong. But... my goal here is something a little more intimate.
A swordsman, huh? I prefer a spear, but I couldn't imagine going into battle without my bow.
Do you really rush into combat without a ranged weapon? Must be hard fighting with nothing but a sword.
...You seem nervous, Dwight. It's not because of me, is it?
So your world is ravished by machines too... Let me guess. The mistakes of an egotistical madman?
Let me take a guess, Dunban. A madman with delusions of grandeur messed everything up, and that's why you fight machines?
Rare sight to get to see a man strip. Most of them are too scared of a machine attacking.
I don't care about what you take off. Just how you are in a fight... and how you look underneath.
Let's see your scars, ~name~.
No shame in losing to a Nora, ~name~. We always get our mark.
Men take defeat gracefully... as least, they're supposed to.
I've still got plenty of stamina. The hunt's just getting started.
I just hope you're not a man who thinks good looks is enough.
A decent man is better than a good-looking one... but, well, both are nice.
Some tribes might forbid me watching you right now. Good thing I really don't care.
I may not have a lot of experience, but I can still see the appeal here.
Lots of questions I could ask you, ~name~. Tell me a thing about yourself first.
You're not dressed for hunting, so... more for appeal?
You've caught my interest, ~name~. Even the hunter gets ensnared sometimes.
This is the part of the hunt that always gives me a thrill.
Going to show me your tribe's mating ritual?
It's rare I get to appreciate something like this. I'll have to give you my full attention.
Hmm... Hard to focus... I'll have to try for ~name~, at least...
~Name~'s up? Good...
My Focus isn't picking up much... I'll need to see all of ~name~ directly...
No need for shame, ~name~. See? I don't have much.
My experience with men tells me they won't pass up an opportunity to show off.
...It's odd that we come from totally different worlds, but we can understand each other without a problem. Hmm...
There is a thrill in being exposed... Well, let's see how ~name~ feels about it.
The breeze here feels nice. I'm sure you'll like it, ~name~.
Chie, right? I'm glad that people from other times like meat too, though you probably have more variety than I do.
I knew they still liked meat in the old world, but... even in my time, I've never met somebody as dedicated as you, Chie. Wish I had the same amount of variety as you.
Always glad to run into another warrior. I just hope you're fighting for a good cause, not the money.
Leonie, is it? I'm happy to see another warrior... though I do hope you're not only in it for the money. The cause is more important.
...Another human from deep space, huh? Please tell me you're not with Far Zenith. They've caused me enough trouble...
Far Zenith aren't stupid enough to follow me here, right? ...Sorry, I'm just wary of people from space now.
You're... gaudy, aren't you? Dealing with people so self-important is pretty exhausting...
I've met a lot of vain people in my journeys. ...They're always a real pain in the ass.
...That's an old world weapon, isn't it? I've never seen one like that in pristine condition. Wish I had something like that...
You're just trudging around old world weapons all the time, huh? Well, I'm at least glad I got to see one in good condition. Only wish I had one on me.
So where you come from, humans and machines live side-by-side? I wish I could live in a world like that...
It must be nice having machines and humans living together, Angela. Wish my world was as united.
...Honestly, I always thought it was weird that funerals are a business in Liyue.
I'm grateful for that "Vision" thing and all, but Liyue's obsession with their Archon felt wrong.
So, how's Mondstadt holding up, Sucrose? Can those Knights keep it together without me?
I've been finding a lot of really interesting flora in the west. Sometimes, it makes me think of you.
I've never heard of a "Silent Hill" in my travels. ...Based on what I'm getting from you, it sounds like that's a good thing.
Rare to meet a woman of the sea. Especially one who's so obsessed with money...
Are you just here to try and make money? Sorry to say, but I doubt you'll find Metal Shards as valuable as I do.
I promise I'm not that judgmental, ~name~. Just meet a lot of people who need judging.
The card part is a competition, but you have nothing to prove now, ~name~.
Some people see it as a badge of honor to get defeated by me. No idea why.
I've always been pretty curious... Not to say ~name~ is nothing special, but...
Looks can be deceiving. Let's see what ~name~'s really made of.
Why restrict yourself to men or women? They both have their appeals.
You fought a good fight, and that's really what matters.
A good start, but I know better than to get complacent during the hunt.
Is it not a big deal when it's between women? I don't really understand that, but alright.
Are you from a tribe too, ~name~? ...No, you're way too open-minded.
I've taken a liking to you, ~name~. Really hope you're not secretly crazy.
I've had some female admirers too... Not that they're easier to deal with than the male ones.
I'm open to anyone, ~name~, so long as they can keep up with me.
Are you going to pay off my patience, or what?
You know I've been showing a lot of restraint by not coming over there, right?
I'm starting to feel all hot... and it looks like ~name~'s about to turn up the heat.
This is the good part, right...?
Hmm... I'll have to try to stay focused for ~name~...
I'm a patient woman, but... Everything has its limits...
This is normally no big deal for me, but... in this context...
Are you more fit for hunting or gathering, ~name~? Let's find out.
Sometimes, I prefer hanging around other women more than men. Feels like they have less to prove.
I'm already spent, but... you can still impress me, ~name~.
A lot of people see me as an inspiration. Have I inspired you at all, ~name~?
...Well, that was a waste of time.
I may be a hunter, but I don't go after other people. ...Not unless they give me a good reason to.
Hmph. Considering you're still standing, I trust you know what you're doing. What's your primary quarry, anyway?
Well, you're here, so... I trust it's worked out well enough for you. What is it you use that sword to fight, anyway?
I know "small" things can hold a lot of value. Rost's necklace is still special to me.
Give it a thousand years, and a whole tribe could sprout up around ~name~'s ~clothing~.
I won't disparage you, ~name~... but how important is it if you're willing to take it off...?
I never knew this game was so... thrilling.
Never read about ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ in any old world documents...
Like going out to hunt boars and coming back with frogs.
My Focus isn't picking up anything. Must not even be worth scanning.
That's all? No, great. I've got plenty of time to kill.
...My patience is wearing thin. I said I came here for a good time.
You're not trying to get me to come over there and strip you myself, right? I don't fall for tricks like that.
This is what men had to offer in the old world? Really?
Oh, no, don't worry. I'm used to men who can't back up their talk.
...Huh. Not really what I expected...
No, that's... that's fine... really...
Good thing I'm used to relying on my thoughts...
I don't like people who play games... And yeah, I know that's ironic.
You're taunting me, right? I'll get you back for that next time.
A little teasing makes the ending better, right? I'm still figuring this out.
Stalling for time? That's a... valid strategy. Just not a fun one.
You've got nothing to prove to me, ~name~. Seems like you already know that.
That didn't take very long, at least. Let's keep the game moving.
I... appreciate the effort.
Who knows. Maybe in ~name~'s culture, taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off is taboo.
Worth recording in the Focus, at least. Maybe somebody can recreate ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
Well, at least we can all stop to stretch.
Trying to increase your mobility? I doubt we'll have to make a quick getaway, but you never know.
...Still, I understand not wanting to be exposed, ~name~. It's... odd for me too.
Oh well. Not exactly on my list of things worth getting angry over.
At least we can keep this game moving along, right?
Better than trying to impress me. I prefer men who can do that without trying.
Are you just going to be another cowardly man I've met, ~name~, or do you want to prove yourself better than them?
Skin against skin... always feels nice...
The warmth of a fire, the sound of rushing water... I like that sense of peace...
A nice, warm bed... Maybe somebody to join me in it...
Mmh... Enough time to stretch, at least.
That all? Feels like we didn't have to stop and wait around just for that.
You have nothing to prove to me, ~name~. Not sure if everybody else feels the same way.
Are we all stopping to stare? I don't see the point.
I mean, everybody deserves to be sent off. Charging people money for it just seems wrong.
It just makes me think, "I wonder what Sucrose would say about this." I know a lot about foraging, but you study this stuff for a living.
I understand how you must feel. Machines once served a peaceful purpose where I'm from. Hard to imagine that now.
I get that, really. People keep telling me that machines weren't as bad before I was born. I find it hard to imagine.
...Do you really have to do it like that...?
Wonder if ~clothing.ifPlural(those were|that was)~ made by hand, or by a machine.
I think I saw something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ in a Zero Dawn recording...
Wow, ~name~ is really busting out all the stops. I'm swooning.
We're still in the setup phase, right? I learned about that in Machine Strike.
Are you more or less nervous because we're both women? Still figuring that out.
Not a lot of time to worry about fashion in the wilds.
Are you just psyching yourself up? Well, it can be nerve-wracking...
If you're hesitating, it helps to just move your body before your brain can stop to think about it.
Really interesting stuff, ~name~. No, seriously. I've never seen anything like ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ before.
At this rate, I should've just stayed back at base...
Glad to see you saved the good stuff until I was nearly out, ~name~.
You're only psyching me up for the hunt. You know that, right?
Ugh...
Whatever... I'll make do...
Hmph...
...Is this an insult? It feels like you're taunting me.
I'm not too thrilled right now, but it's not like I'm going to walk over there and start ripping your clothes off.

You're just being careful in case a Slaughterspine shows up, right? Smart.
...That was a joke, by the way.
I'm out of the running, right? All I can hope is that everybody else knocks ~name~ down another peg.
...R-Right. Nobody's come back to haunt me yet, so I'm pretty sure ghosts only exist in Teyvat. Over here, we just do it because it's the right thing to do.
You guys sure put a lot of faith in your knights. Wish I could have half as much confidence in the tribes.

I want to learn more about you, ~name~. I'm sure you have plenty to tell me.

Not bad... Not good, but not bad...

I'm surprised you're able to do that without much trouble. Even when I'm alone, it usually takes me longer...
...Ugh. I don't mind the excitement, but I'm not much of a fan of the mess...
Mmph... Maybe I should try copying you...
It's not a competition, but... we could make it one.
Ugh, I'm getting covered in sweat... It's all because of ~name~...
Getting deep inside myself is one thing... Getting deep inside ~name~, though...
That was... pretty great. I hate being this excited when I can't act on it... Maybe you can help me out, ~name~.
I hope this place doesn't make me develop any weird fetishes. People already think I'm strange.
Did I help with that at all? I'm not sure if you were even looking at me.
Pretty exhausting, right? We can stretch together if you'd like. Always helps me feel less tired.
I-I'm getting there too...
Damn... I wanted to finish first... Be the one to egg ~name~ on...
Huh? Oh, ~name~'s done... I-I can't concentrate...
Just a little more... I'll be there with ~name~ soon...
...Me first. I'm so used to having to prove myself, work harder than anybody to be the best. But... for once, I don't mind being in last.
...Honestly, I don't care at this point. It'd be more of a punishment if I just had to walk out of here while I'm still craving something.
I don't mind if you all stare. I'd actually find it comforting if I knew you liked this. ...Alright, here goes nothing.
Ah... Never been watched before... It's not so bad...
I'm not... totally inexperienced... but I've still got things to learn...
I already know how good this feels... Wish I could do it more often...
Being near the same people for so long at our base... Sometimes, I get temptations...
I don't have all the fancy material they had in the old world, but... my imagination suits me fine...
It helps to think of sensations... Like the warmth of a Blaze canister on a chilly night...
Better than doing it in the wilds... I can tell you that much...
I know how to make myself feel best, but... you have to work up to it...
I haven't spent a lot of time with men or women, but... this place is making me curious...
Mmph... Can't rush it... Just be patient and build up to it...
Nngh... I can't... stop these noises...
I-I'm losing control...
I-I'm going to... Mm...
Hah... Deep breaths... Just ride it out...!
This is going... a lot better than I thought it would, hah...
Oh... That's... Ahh!
Wow, that was, um... a lot better than I expected. I didn't realize how much I needed that.
It might be weird to get back on my feet so soon, but I hate sitting around for too long.
HADES caused me a lot of trouble. I thought things might get easier when he was destroyed. Hah, as if my life's ever been easy.
Some people think of AI like they're just tools. The ones I know... they're more human than some people I've met.
...Sorry if I was too self-conscious back there. I'm just too used to people looking at me like I'm some kind of freak, or their savior. I'm really just a person.
After the Battle of the Alight, I didn't want any of my friends to get caught up in my battles. ...I won't make that mistake again.
Before I was born, most machines were actually docile. I hope I can make a world like that again, someday.
This guy in the old world, Ted Faro, caused a lot of problems. If you see him in your time period, punch him in the face for me.
Nothing like riding around on a machine with the wind on your back after a ~background.time~ like this.
I need some time to rest, but... maybe another round wouldn't hurt...
...I didn't tell any of my friends about this, by the way. This is strictly between us.
Oh, that's it? Really? Could you put up more of a fight next time?
...Hmm. That's annoying. Just when I was getting started. Could you all put up more of a fight next time?
That was a good time. I don't have much more time to spare, but maybe you'll see me around. Until next time, ~player~.
